It didnt work on my 2110 max, but then I found out you have to copy and replace the maps one by one. Do not replace the MapDrawer.nfs file. This will hang up your navigon. Try with one file at a time and remember what you did if something goes wrong. 
The maps can be be selected in "show map", "options", "settings", "map", use the "" to select the new card (2011). 
Hope this helps. âş
